demo_products.title: Premium Wireless Headphones
demo_products.description: Experience crystal-clear audio with our premium wireless headphones. Featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design. Perfect for music lovers, travelers, and professionals who demand the best sound quality.
demo_products.short_description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

demo_products.title: Smart Fitness Watch
demo_products.description: Track your fitness goals with our advanced smart fitness watch. Features include heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and 50+ sport modes. Water-resistant up to 50m and compatible with iOS and Android devices.
demo_products.short_description: Advanced fitness watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 50+ sport modes.

demo_products.title: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
demo_products.description: Sustainably made from 100% organic cotton, this premium t-shirt offers unmatched comfort and style. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Eco-friendly production process with minimal environmental impact. Perfect for everyday wear.
demo_products.short_description: Premium 100% organic cotton t-shirt in multiple colors.

demo_products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
demo_products.description: Keep your drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours with our premium insulated water bottle. Made from high-quality stainless steel, BPA-free, and features a leak-proof lid. Available in 500ml and 750ml sizes.
demo_products.short_description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours.

demo_products.title: Yoga Mat Pro
demo_products.description: Professional-grade yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly TPE material, non-slip surface, and includes carrying strap. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and general fitness exercises. Available in multiple colors.
demo_products.short_description: Professional eco-friendly yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning.

demo_products.title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
demo_products.description: Powerful portable speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery life, and IPX7 waterproof rating. Perfect for outdoor adventures, pool parties, and travel. Connects easily via Bluetooth 5.0 to any device.
demo_products.short_description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound.

demo_products.title: LED Desk Lamp
demo_products.description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Features USB charging port, touch controls, and energy-efficient LED technology. Perfect for home office, study, or bedside table.
demo_products.short_description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with USB charging port and touch controls.

demo_products.title: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
demo_products.description: Premium bamboo cutting board set includes 3 sizes for all your kitchen needs. Naturally antibacterial, eco-friendly, and gentle on knife blades. Features juice grooves and non-slip feet. Easy to clean and maintain.
demo_products.short_description: Eco-friendly bamboo cutting board set with 3 sizes.
